data.title: Courteney Cox, 58, Recreates Old Tampax Ad to Discuss Menopause
data.meta_description: Courteney Cox recreated her 1985 Tampax ad to get real about menopause on Instagram. Fans loved the honesty and thought the clip was hilarious.
